issue.title: Informing tests of their own directory location
Informing tests of their own directory location

content.html:
A way to improve this idea: We can create a header that defines some macros to reflect the compiler flags, along with explanations about where those compiler flags are set. For example:

// ign-common/test/test_config.hh

/// \brief This macro specifies the location of the plugin libraries that are used by
/// the integration tests. The macro DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_PLUGIN_PATH is
/// provided as a compile definition, defined in the file ign-common/test/CMakeLists.txt
#define IGN_COMMON_PLUGIN_PATH \
    DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_PLUGIN_PATH

This would make the macros much more transparent for developers, and help to remind us of where and how they get defined.
